disclaimerMessages: Note to MAGA cult: Relax, snowflake!
I really am saying #1. Go ask Elon. He's #1.
He knows all about gestures and their meanings (cough cough).
It's just a misunderstood, heartfelt gesture, after all.
(No Twitter engineers were harmed in the making of this meme)

accomplishments.text: ✅ First U.S. president to be a convicted felon. Truly setting new records in leadership.
✅ Officially found liable for sexual assault. Because ‘locker room talk’ wasn’t enough.
✅ First president to redefine 'independence' by making independent agencies answerable to his whims. Because who needs checks and balances?
✅ Issued an executive order to end birthright citizenship. Why let the Constitution get in the way of policy?
✅ Pardoned January 6th rioters, including violent criminals—while claiming other countries are ‘emptying their prisons into the U.S.’ Turns out, he’s the one who did it.

introList: The Convicted Felon (and even worse, an adjudicated sexual offender)
Welcome to the Trump Submission Gallery, where people from all walks of life come together to honor Donald Trump as Number One.
memeInstructionsList: Show your middle finger and strike a pose!
Image will capture automatically, but only when it detects you flipping your best "#1" gesture (aka. flip the bird) with your middle finger only.
It works best if you are an arm's length away from the camera.
Once it detects your gesture, it will start a 3 second countdown before.....
